page.title: 14ENTERTAIMENT
page.content: There are several enthusiastic drama and opera groups in Musselburgh. When Bruton Hall was opened in 1971 by Queen Elizabeth, The Queen Mother, it was decided to include a proper theatre with in the building. It seats up to 360 people. Backstage there are dressing rooms for 36 artists. There is a special group of people known as the Friends Of The Theatre who want to encourage the development and success of the local threatre and to promote interest in the Arts. In September 1985 there was an Arts Fair in Bruton Hall. It featured Craft Demonstrations, Exhibitions, Performances, street theatre, and children's activities.
